text: Today I'm going to take the slack out of a strand of barb wire here on my fence that has gotten loose and I'm going to use this device called a wire titaner. This is a Jake's wire titaner. There's several brands I'm not getting paid for promoting jakes. That's just happened to be the one I have and I'm going to put it on here and tighten this strand of fence. That's all there is to it. It makes it tight as a banjo string.
